Citation

citation.Rmd

To cite the hiaR package in publications, please use:

Boshuizen, H., Lüken, M., Hafner, F., & Bogaardt, L. Dynamic Modeling of Health Impact Assessment in R (Version 1.0.0) [Computer software]. https://github.com/Dynamo-HIA/hiaR

or use the bibtex entry:

@software{Boshuizen_Dynamic_Modeling_of,
  author = {Boshuizen, Hendriek and Lüken, Malte and Hafner, Flavio and Bogaardt, Laurens},
  license = {GPL-3.0-or-later},
  title = {{Dynamic Modeling of Health Impact Assessment in R}},
  url = {https://github.com/Dynamo-HIA/hiaR},
  version = {1.0.0}
}

The hiaR package is a wrapper for the DYNAMO-HIA software tool. To cite the DYNAMO-HIA software in publications, please use:

  • Boshuizen, H. C., Lhachimi, S. K., van Baal, P. H. M., Hoogenveen, R. T., Smit, H. A., Mackenbach, J. P., & Nusselder, W. J. (2012). The DYNAMO-HIA Model: An Efficient Implementation of a Risk Factor/Chronic Disease Markov Model for Use in Health Impact Assessment (HIA). Demography, 49(4), 1259–1283. https://doi.org/10.1007/s13524-012-0122-z

  • Lhachimi, S. K., Nusselder, W. J., Boshuizen, H. C., & Mackenbach, J. P. (2010). Standard Tool for Quantification in Health Impact Assessment: A Review. American Journal of Preventive Medicine, 38(1), 78–84. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.amepre.2009.08.030

Developed by Hendriek Boshuizen, Malte Lüken, Flavio Hafner, Laurens Bogaardt.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.1.
